refnamediv.refpurpose: List the content of an HDF5 object (group or dataset)

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: content = h5ls(obj [, name [, filter]]) content = h5ls(filename, name [, filter])

listitem.para: a string giving the path to the object to list
a string giving the type to filter
a matrix of strings with 2 columns

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: List the content of a group or a dataset. The first column gives the names and the second one the type of the listed element.
The filter can take one of the values 'group' (or 'g'), 'dataset' (or 'd'), 'type' (or 't') and 'attribute' (or 'a'). For example, if 'g' is given, only the groups will be returned.
